settings.contenttitle: From the Front Lines, For the Front Lines
settings.contenttext1: At Dr. Woof Apparel, we’re more than just another uniform brand—we’re clinicians who share your commitment to patient care. Founded by a family of three veterinarians, two of whom are still actively working full-time, we stay on top of every challenge you face in the real world. Because we’re in the trenches too, we obsess over every design detail—continually refining based on your feedback and cutting no corners. The result? Medical apparel that stands up to the longest shifts, created by professionals who truly understand what you need—every single day.

settings.product_story_title_1: 20% Rayon (aka vegan silk) for a feel so soft you'll want a second pair for bedtime.
settings.product_story_title_2: Move, bend, stretch & crouch (without showing your bum crack.)
settings.product_story_title_3: Bye bye sweaty, too-big hospital scrubs. Hello superior comfort all shift long.
settings.product_story_title_4: From seam yanking to wash testing — our custom 17-step QA process ensures top quality every time.

settings.title: Why you'll love our scrubs
settings.title_1: 20% Rayon (aka vegan silk) for a feel so soft you'll want a second pair for bedtime.
settings.title_2: Move, bend, stretch & crouch (without showing your bum crack.)

settings.title_1: Bye bye sweaty, too-big hospital scrubs. Hello superior comfort all shift long.
settings.title_2: From seam yanking to wash testing — our custom 17-step QA process ensures top quality every time.

settings.title: Are your scrubs true to size?
settings.text: Yes! Most of our customers find the fit perfect. To ensure the best fit, simply compare your measurements with our detailed sizing chart. Plus, we offer easy exchanges if it’s not the right size.

settings.title: What size am I?
settings.text: Finding your perfect size is simple. Just check our sizing chart to match your measurements. We provide separate charts for women and men for easy reference.

settings.title: Do you offer petite and tall sizes?
settings.text: Yes! Our core colors are available in regular, petite, and tall sizes. For limited edition releases, availability may vary based on demand, but we’re always expanding our options.

settings.title: How do I care for my Dr. Woof scrubs?
settings.text: Keep them looking great with a cold machine wash inside-out and tumble dry on low. It’s that easy—our scrubs are built to last with minimal care.

settings.title: Will you be offering more sizes and colours soon?
settings.text: Absolutely! We’re constantly adding new sizes and colors. Sign up for our mailing list at the bottom of the page to stay updated on all our latest releases.

settings.title: Any plans for larger sizes?
settings.text: Yes! We introduced 3XL in late 2023 and are committed to expanding our size range to ensure everyone can find the perfect fit.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.text: We offer a 60-day return policy for clean, unworn items in their original packaging. Returns are easy, and we’re here to help make the process seamless.

settings.title: How do I initiate a return?
settings.text: Just send us an email, and we’ll guide you through the simple steps to return your item. We’re here to make it hassle-free.

settings.title: How long does it take to receive my refund?
settings.text: Once we receive and inspect your return, refunds are processed within 5 business days. Depending on your payment method, it may take a little longer to appear in your account.
